description: Configuration for automatic cluster labeling using c-TF-IDF and LLM

llm_settings.system_prompt: You are an expert at analyzing and summarizing SAE (Sparse Autoencoder) feature explanations. Generate concise, descriptive labels that capture the common themes in clusters of explanations.

comment: This configuration controls the automatic labeling of explanation clusters. c-TF-IDF extracts distinctive terms per cluster. If llm_settings.enabled=true, an LLM generates human-readable labels. If false, labels use the top c-TF-IDF terms (controlled by ctfidf_settings.label_n_terms).
